item1.description: Gett is setting the standard for quality by becoming the first major taxi app to provide carbon neutral rides in the UK
item1.title: Gett Green

item2.description: The film festival in London invited fans and tourists through targeted two week campaign with social influencers
item2.title: Russian Film Week

item3.description: Ideal Flatmate, UK‚Äôs first flat-matching website used MNFST‚Äôs unique advertising format to market their service in London
item3.title: Ideal Flatmate

item4.description: Aspire is running their biggest charity event The Aspire Channel Swim to raise donations for people paralyzed by spinal cord injury and invite participants and supporters to promote the cause via MNFST
item4.title: Aspire

item6.description: Online international luxury and streetwear store. The Box Boutique reported a 25% increase in their website traffic after a 6 six week MNFST campaign
item6.title: Box Boutique

item1.testimony: MNFST has a truly innovative approach to digital marketing; one which Gett, as a fellow disruptor and tech innovator, highly appreciates. We were very impressed by how quickly the MNFST team was able to ramp up and scale, and in a way that was not only seamless to operate, but also very much on brand ‚Äì and consumer-friendly. We are eager to see what the MNFST team does next ‚Äì and look forward to playing a part in their successful path forward.

item2.testimony: MNFST is a good brand awareness tool, where friends, influencers and partners come together to support a particular brand or initiative by endorsing it with their pictures on social media. We used it for our festival and got significant boost in brand recognition.

item3.testimony: We have found MNFST to be a great addition to our digital marketing mix. The process was easy to set up and thanks to the service we soon had hundreds of Londoners talk about our flat sharing service over social media. Its a great way for us to tap into communities through word of mouth and MNFST allowed us to do this at scale.

author.name: Rebecca Buchanan
author.position: digital Marketing Manager, The Prince‚Äôs Trust

item4.testimony: At The Prince‚Äôs Trust, we‚Äôre keen to try new innovations that could help us reach new supporters or young people. MNFST has provided us that opportunity to do just that. Working with MNFST has been a great experience, the team are very professional and supported us every step of the way, including with creative design and getting us involved with all the latest features on the platform.

item5.testimony: We were one of the first online boutiques to try MNFST. We found the whole process very easy ‚Äì from selecting the right imagery to liaising with the MNFST team. As a result, we had a 25% increase in website traffic during the time when the campaign was running which are very happy with. It‚Äôs a great new way to promote your brand through a large audience.

texts.description: Add different texts for each social network of your choice
texts.title: Campaign texts

facebook.feedDescription: Users optionally posts this text with Manifest Post. Fit your message to the audience in 200 symbols. Only first 60 symbols are visible on mobile devices. You can add hashtags and links to posts in Facebook
facebook.storyDescription: Users optionally pins this text alongside Manifest Story. Keep it short, most users tend to post a very short message in Stories. Campaign Slogan is good option, when not used on creative itself.

instagram.feedDescription: Users optionally posts this text with Manifest Post. Fit your message to the audience in 200 symbols. Only first 60 symbols are visible on mobile devices. Mention your instagram account and add hashtags
instagram.storyDescription: Users optionally pins this text alongside Manifest Story. Keep it short, most users tend to post a very short message in Stories. Campaign Slogan is good option, when not used on creative itself.

postText.description: Campaign description is the best place to describe what services or products you are willing to promote with MNFST users. If your creatives imply any certain behavior for users put it here. Don‚Äôt use hashtags or links.
postText.title: Campaign Description

twitter.description: Users optionally posts this text with Manifest. Send your mewssage to the audience in 260 symbols. Don‚Äôt hesitate to mention your twitter profile, add links & hasgtags.
twitter.title: Tweet Text

join.description: You don‚Äôt have to be an Instagram celebrity or top-ranking influencer anymore ‚Äì every voice counts, and everyone can monetise their social media profiles with MNFST. Get MNFST app and join the revolution!

instagramPublic.title: How to make account public on Instagram?

iOS.section1: Go to your Profile and tap menu icon on the right
iOS.section3: Scroll a bit and tap on the Account Privacy section
iOS.section4: Make sure Private account option is turned off
iOS.section5: Voila! Use Rescore button in MNFST app or you will be rescored automartically within a day

android.section1: Go to your Profile and tap menu icon on the right
android.section3: Make sure Private account option is turned off
android.section4: Voila! Use Rescore button in MNFST app or you will be rescored automartically within a day

mobile.section1: Go to your Profile and tap menu icon on the left
mobile.section3: Make sure Private account option is unchecked
mobile.section4: Voila! Use Rescore button in MNFST app or you will be rescored automartically within a day

facebookPublic.title: How to make friend list public on Facebook?

iOS.section1: Tap menu icon in the tab bar below the screen
iOS.section2: Scroll down the list and tap Settings & Privacy section
iOS.section4: Tap See more privacy settings section on Privacy card
iOS.section5: Scroll down a bit and tap on Who can see your friend list section
iOS.section7: Voila! Use Rescore button in MNFST app or you will be rescored automartically within a day

android.section1: Tap menu icon in the tab bar on the top of the screen
android.section2: Scroll down and tap on the Privacy Shortcuts section
android.section4: Tap See more privacy settings section on Privacy card
android.section5: Scroll down a bit and tap on Who can see your friend list section
android.section7: Voila! Use Rescore button in MNFST app or you will be rescored automartically within a day

mobile.section1: Tap menu icon in the tab bar on the top of the screen
mobile.section2: Scroll down and tap on the Privacy Shortcuts section
mobile.section3: Tap See more privacy settings section on Privacy card
mobile.section4: Scroll down a bit and tap on Who can see your friend list section
mobile.section6: Voila! Use Rescore button in MNFST app or you will be rescored automartically within a day

twitterPublic.title: How to make Tweets public on Twitter?

iOS.section1: Tap on your profile picture on Home screen
iOS.section2: Tap on the Settings and Privacy section
iOS.section4: Make sure Protect your Tweets option is turned off
iOS.section5: Voila! Use Rescore button in MNFST app or you will be rescored automartically within a day

android.section1: Tap on your profile picture on Home screen
android.section2: Tap on the Settings and Privacy section
android.section4: Make sure Protect your Tweets option is unchecked
android.section5: Voila! Use Rescore button in MNFST app or you will be rescored automartically within a day

mobile.section1: Tap on your profile picture on Home screen
mobile.section2: Tap on the Settings and Privacy section
mobile.section4: Make sure Protect your Tweets option is unchecked
mobile.section5: Voila! Use Rescore button in MNFST app or you will be rescored automartically within a day

disabledFacebook.title: I don't see any Manifests for Facebook

default.p1: Unfortunately, for technical reasons, the MNFST app is no longer able to support campaigns on Facebook. We are currently trying to fix the situation, but we do not know when or if a solution will be reached. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience.
default.p2: But, there are still plenty of chances to earn and show your support for the causes and events you care about by participating in any of our campaigns via Twitter and Instagram. We will be also adding more social networks soon!
default.p3: We appreciate your support and understanding. If you have any further questions, please write to

default.st1: How should I approach a brand?
default.st2: When do I receive my money?
default.p1: If you love a brand and know a relevant person there, please connect us
default.p2: Send them an introductory E-mail about MNFST: tell them who we are and why they should work with us. Direct them to business.mnfst.com to book a demo. And don‚Äôt forget to mention that they‚Äôll get up to a 50% discount for their first campaign
default.p3: Keep ${businessEmail} cc‚Äôd while communicating with anyone who works for a Brand you are introducing us to
default.p4: You receive $200 when the Brand spends over $1,000 on campaigns with MNFST
default.p5: You can earn $200 multiple times if you refer more than one brand

default.t1: How does the Referral Program ‚ÄúBoost‚Äù work?
default.t4: How many friends can I invite?
default.t5: What do my friends need to do?
default.t6: Who is eligible to participate in the Referral Program?
default.t7: How do I track my referrals?
default.t8: Where can I find my referral link?
default.t9: My friend forgot to use my referral link. Is there a way to get paid for that referral?
default.t10: Can I get paid for previous users I referred before the Referral Program launched?
default.t11: Can I refer friends in any country?
default.t12: Why do I not see the offer to invite friends and earn more money?
default.t13: The amount I earn for my referrals changes from user to user, and for some, I don‚Äôt receive any money. Why is that?
default.t14: I can see that many of the friends I invited have downloaded the MNFST app via my referral link, but I haven‚Äôt received money for a single one of my referrals. Why?
default.t15: How can I earn the promised $50 for inviting friends, if the reward for a single user is several times less?
default.t16: I want to bring many new users to MNFST, but I don‚Äôt like some of the conditions of the referral program.
default.p1: Invite friends by sending your personal referral link.
default.p2: After your friend installs the MNFST app and joins any paid campaign, you will earn the equivalent of your friend‚Äôs earnings for that campaign (max ‚Äì $20).
default.p3: Referral links only work for invited friends who have not previously registered with MNFST and who possesses a Social Capital Score above 55 points.
default.p4: You can earn up to $50. If you believe that $50 is not enough and that you have more friends you could invite, please contact us.
default.p5: You can invite any of your friends who are on Instagram and Twitter who have not previously registered with MNFST. They must also have a social capital score above 55 points.
default.p6: You can refer an unlimited number of friends, and we encourage you to share with as many friends as you would like. However, the maximum you can earn ($50) does not change, regardless of the number of friends you invite, unless you contact MNFST directly.
default.p8: Create a user account in the App
default.p9: Successfully participate in a paid campaign (Your friend has to leave the promotional post/tweet up on a social media account for at least 24 hours)
default.p11: Friends who have not previously registered with MNFST and possess a Social Capital Score above 55.
default.p12: You can track the status of your invites in the mobile app on the ‚ÄúBoost‚Äù screen section.
default.p13: Your referral link can be found in the mobile app under the section labeled Boost. If you can‚Äôt find your personal referral link, please contact us.
default.p14: Unfortunately, we are unable to track your referral if your friend  did not use your referral link at the time they signed up and participated in one of MNFST's campaigns.
default.p15: Unfortunately, we are unable to track any of your referrals before the official Referral Program launch date.
default.p16: Yes, you may, but please keep in mind that your earnings may vary by country. Also, please be aware that the referral program may not be available in certain countries.
default.p17: Unfortunately, the referral program does not work in all countries, meaning not all users will see this offer in the app.
default.p18: You only receive money from your referral after the invited user successfully participates in a paid campaign. It is possible that not everyone you invite chose to post a Manifest on their social networks.
default.p19: The social accounts belonging to those you invite must not have been previously registered on the MNFST platform. If they have, you will not receive additional earnings for that user‚Äôs paid campaign.
default.p20: The total payment depends on the influence of the user you invited. Those who are more influential on social media (i.e. higher Social Capital Score) earn more per campaign, which, in turn, means that you earn more for that user. However, the maximum you can earn for one referral is $20.
default.p21: If the user you invited has very few friends and posts on social media networks, then you will not receive any additional earnings for that user‚Äôs first paid campaign.
default.p22: You or user you invited violates other Referral Rules.
default.p23: In order to receive money from the referral program, those you invite must download and successfully participate in a paid campaign. If your friend only installed the application, then suggest that they participate in a paid campaign on MNFST. You can send a personalized ‚Äúpush‚Äù via the app.
default.p24: Share your personalized link with a wider circle of people and recommend our service to your friends. If you invite people who know you, they are more likely to respond and try to use MNFST.
default.p25: The maximum you can earn via the referral program is $50. If you have already earned $50, but have more friends you could invite, write to us at ${contactLink} We will consider increasing your personal limit for your earnings via the referral program.
default.p26: We are always working to make MNFST better and our users happier. Tell us your suggestions by writing to ${contactLink}. We‚Äôll take a look and get back to you as soon as possible.
